first_translate: look over there!  they’re coming this way.
is that little kid really his grace’s proxy?
I thought she was just some scammer...
this is quite surprising...
it looks like I’m still not used to being back inside my child body.

hangle: 이 정도로 노골적인 반응이 나올 줄이야….
first_translate: even so...  I didn’t expect them to react this strongly toward me...

hangle: 날 의심하고 있었다면서 나한테 영주의 권한을 빌려주다니.
first_translate: if duke abel suspected me of lying about my identity, why did he give me these powers as lord of airelle?

hangle: 아벨은 왜 내게 이 일을 맡겼을까?
first_translate: but why would abel have given me such responsibility?
jeron would’ve been more suitable for this job since he's older than me.
well, whatever the reason may be...
all I need to do now is carry out what needs to be done.
the first thing on my agenda will be deciding how those mercenaries are going to be punished.

hangle: 사실 사건을 일으킨 용병을 벌하는 것만큼,
first_translate: punishing the ones responsible isn’t all that matters here.
the significance behind their punishment also plays a crucial role.
in other words, we must make examples out of them.

hangle: 똑같은 짓을 저지르면 너 역시 이 꼴이 된다는 경고.
first_translate: we’ll show everyone else what happens when you commit crimes similar to theirs.

hangle: 이번 일이 잘되면 마을의 치안에 도움이 되겠지만,
first_translate: while punishing them properly could help maintain order within the territory,
a lenient sentence might end up having adverse effects instead.
when people see others getting away with light punishments,
that makes me think maybe I can do it too.
that’s simply human nature.

hangle: 북부에 어울리는 처벌 방법이 뭐가 있을까….
first_translate: let’s see... what kind of punishment fits best for the north region?

hangle: 음…. 도둑질을 하면 손목을 자르기까지 하니까….
first_translate: since thieves usually lose their hands after committing theft,
maybe something along those lines would work well for sexual harassment cases--

hangle: 역시 중요 부위를 자를 수밖에 없나….
first_translate: cutting off certain parts from their bodies sounds fitting enough...
wait, cut off what exactly...?
nope, nevermind.
I knew I shouldn’t have sent siegren away.
if cutting things off won’t work,

hangle: 그래, 이 두 가지 중에 선택하라고 하자.
first_translate: then let’s go with one of these two options.
fiona.
they’re finally here.
my goodness, look at her size...
does anyone know what his grace was thinking by sending someone so young?
do you guys actually believe she’s his grace’s proxy?
excuse me...
can you please move aside?
stay calm, siegren.
alright then...
thank you very much...

hangle: 이 상황에 넌 화도 안 나?
first_translate: aren’t you even angry right now?
getting mad wouldn’t solve anything anyway.
h-hey!
wait!
what is it?
it’s alright, siegren...
lady proxima,

hangle: 어쩌다 이런 거친 일을 맡게 된 건지 모르겠지만….
first_translate: I don’t know how you ended up taking charge of this case,
but those men aren’t your average criminals.

hangle: 하지만 저런 자들이 마을에서 활개 치면
first_translate: and if they continue causing trouble around our village,
don’t you feel uncomfortable knowing that?
even so...

hangle: 어린애가 위험한 자들을 상대하는 걸 보고만 있을 수는 없어요.
first_translate: I cannot stand watching a mere child deal with dangerous thugs alone.
m-may I ask what your name is?
i-it’s charlotte.
thanks for worrying about me, ms. charlotte.
let’s head inside, siegren.
shut up and take this off us!

hangle: 우리들이 없으면 마물의 밥이나 될 것들이!!
first_translate: you’d probably become monster food without us protecting you bastards!!
stop moving already!
move outta the way!
why are you suddenly talking about punishment?!
go screw yourselves!!
there they are.
those men seem incredibly strong...

hangle: 병사 두세 명으로도 감당하기 힘들어 보여.
first_translate: not even three soldiers together could handle them easily.
who does that brat think she is?!
huh?
oh, great.  another freeloader.
how come you’re still alive?
calm down, siegren...
so you harassed residents using your large physique,
hit a defenseless boy named siegren,
and committed robbery, assault, and molestation against women...

hangle: 살인 외에 저지를 수 있는 건 다 저질렀다지.
first_translate: looks like you've pretty much broken every law except murder.
terrible scum...
I am here under orders from duke abel helyon.
please stop resisting unnecessarily.
hm?
argh!!
who the hell are you to tell us what to do?! you’re nothing but a tiny girl!
or else what?

hangle: 용병단이 전부 마을을 떠나면 너희들도 다 끝장이야.
first_translate: as soon as the entire mercenary troop leaves this place, you'll be finished.

hangle: 마물이 쳐들어올 때 막아준 게 누군데!
first_translate: who saved you lot from monsters last time?!
right!
ungrateful fools!
these jerks!

hangle: 맞다…. 대화는 말이 통해야 하는 거지?
first_translate: ah yes... communication works better through actions rather than words sometimes.
gaah!

hangle: 말로 했을 때 들으면 얼마나 좋아.
first_translate: now listen carefully while I speak.
okay, sit down quietly--
n-nope.
aaarghhk!!!
enough...
I’ll leave it at that.
kneel down and stay put.
